itemData.title: Coffee Fudge Brownie Ice Cream (100ml)
itemData.description: Creamy coffee ice cream with chocolate fudge swirls and fudgy brownie chunks for a rich, indulgent treat.

itemData.title: Amore Gelato's Coffee Fudge Brownie (Mocha Almond Fudge)
itemData.description: Gooey almond brownie chunks blended into coffee gelato with a swirl of rich chocolate fudge.

itemData.title: Mocha Brownie Ice Cream Dessert
itemData.description: A layered dessert featuring mocha-flavored ice cream combined with brownie pieces and a rich fudge swirl.

itemData.title: Chocolate Fudge Brownie Ice Cream
itemData.description: Decadent chocolate ice cream loaded with chunks of fudge brownies and a luscious fudge ripple.

itemData.title: Brownie Fudge Swirl Ice Cream
itemData.description: Smooth ice cream with generous swirls of fudge and embedded brownie bits for a delightful texture.
